title: OPL Split 2 -Tipping?
body: Will there be OPL tips like last split, i kinda liked earning 5k RP :D

replies.body:
Yeah man - head into https://opltips.com.au/ and you should be able to login and get your tips in for this split.

We have also got UberEATS on board with some extra prizing so if you smash it again you will get even more glory.

Good luck!
